children.text: Various: not covered by competency model
Administration process management (meeting requests, e-mails, phone calls, routeing sheets, signing…)
Admission to practice law in any of the jurisdictions of EUROCONTROL Member States
Assessment tools (Cognitive abilities tests, Personality tests)
Change Management (e.g. reorganisation, transformation/transition of activities, processes, resources)
Conditions of employment in international environment (general, pensions, allowances, …)
Contract management (partnership agreement, specification writing, contract negotiation, follow-up, service-level agreements)
English drafting (e.g. complex reports, WPs, legal documents, project documentation)
English writing (e.g. different texts, expression of oneself in a foreign language)
European Organisation for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE)/Radio Technical Commission for Aeronautics (RTCA) documentation
Financial accounting (balance sheet, forecasting of depreciation, general ledger, profit and loss, fixed asset, IFRS, …)
French drafting (e.g. complex reports, WPs, legal documents, project documentation)
French writing (e.g. different texts, expression of oneself in a foreign language)
Global and European regulatory and standardisation framework
Job interviews life-cycle: interviewing techniques, evaluation, qualification, deliberation
Job Management (job descriptions, job advertisements, recommendations)
Local Committee for Prevention & Protection (LCPP) work
Meeting support (room booking, catering, printing, scanning, setting up presentations, filing, typing, copying)
One of the working languages of the Agency (EN / FR)
Principles for establishing the cost base for en route charges and the calculation of the unit rates
Project management (Scope, Time, Cost, Quality, Human Resource, Communications, Benefit, Risk, Procurement and Stakeholder management)
Recruitment process (job application screening, interviewing techniques, assessment centers, evaluation, qualification, deliberation…)
Selection tests ( administration, interpretation : psychological/personality, cognitive, job-related)
Service for Prevention and Protection (SPP) work
Social security benefits (allowance, sickness and accident insurance, unemployment, pensions, …)
Social security benefits (allowance, sickness and accident insurance, unemployment, pensions, …)
Staff Performance management (e-PA, incentives, rewards, bonuses…)
TENT T/ Connecting Europe Facility(CEF) /INEA funding mechanism
Terminology work ( acronym list, ATM Lexicon)
Testing, process on how to get people tested, regular checks, intervals…
Use of optical character recognition software
Workforce planning (career management, talent management, succession planning, HR forecasting, downsizing, outplacement, ...)
(NOTAM office,  AIP editor , Charting,  Briefing officer )
Aeronautical Information Exchange Model (AIXM) : UML, XML, GML

Airport capacity assessment (constraints, enhancement, througphut, measuring)
Airport CDM (collaborative decision-making), APOC (Airport Operation Center), TAM (Total Airport Management)

Airport operational plans (link with Network Manager Operation Center)
Airside operations (on the side of runway…)

ATM operational concept (En-Route, Approach, Airport, ASM, ATFCM, ….)

Cross border international Air Traffic Control (ATC)
En route control (Air Traffic Control (ATC) , Area Control Center (ACC))

Performance analysis (ICAO KPAs, KPIs, measures, monitoring, metrics)
RPAS (R&D, ATM impact assessment, roadmap, global-scale development)
Runway separation (separation minima, ROT management, contamination, weather)

ATFCM tool : SAFA (Safety Assessment Of Foreign Aircraft)

Cognitive processes (human cognitive architecture, information processing, response execution etc.)

Human in the loop for experimental design purposes
Information security management (protection of classified information, …)

RPAS legal aspects, regulation, standards, ICAO developments

Technical security system (access control system, CCTV, intrusion detection, …)
